rules.natural: If a flood is detected in the basement, then it is not the case that the admin override is active.

Whenever a storm is approaching, then provided that it is not the case that either a fire is detected in the kitchen or a flood is detected in the basement implies the system is not manually disabled, an emergency call is made.
If vacation mode is active, then whenever it is night time, either a pet is inside the house or furniture being moved in the living room results in the alarm not being triggered by the system.
Provided that test mode is active, if it is night time, then either a pet is inside the house or furniture being moved in the living room causes the alarm not to be triggered by the system.
In the event that maintenance is scheduled for the system, either vacation mode is active or test mode is active.
If the entry door is open, then motion is detected by the sensor.
The entry door is open or the living room window is open.
Whenever the living room window is open, the alarm is not triggered by the system.
Under the condition that the surveillance camera is active, the system is in an armed status.
In the event that a fire is detected in the kitchen, it is not the case that the admin override is active.
If it is not the case that the system being powered on implies the surveillance camera is active, then the admin override is active.
Provided that it is not the case that either a fire is detected in the kitchen or a flood is detected in the basement, the system is manually disabled.

In the event that it is not the case that the absence of either a fire detected in the kitchen or a flood detected in the basement implies the system is not manually disabled, it is not the case that an emergency call is made.
Provided that it is not the case that the system not being armed implies the employee is authorized for access, the alarm is triggered by the system.

Maintenance is scheduled for the system.
It is not the case that the employee is authorized for access.
A pet is not inside the house.
Motion is not detected by the sensor.

target.natural: The system is in an armed status.

Under the condition that it is night time, either a pet is inside the house or furniture being moved in the living room leads to the alarm not being triggered by the system.

In the event that furniture is moved in the living room, the alarm is not triggered by the system.

(A10 → ¬A8).natural: If a flood is detected in the basement, then it is not the case that the admin override is active.

(A13 → (¬(¬(A9 ∨ A10) → ¬A11) → A12)).natural: Whenever a storm is approaching, then provided that it is not the case that either a fire is detected in the kitchen or a flood is detected in the basement implies the system is not manually disabled, an emergency call is made.

(A14 → ¬A2).natural: In the event that furniture is moved in the living room, the alarm is not triggered by the system.

(A15 ∨ (A14 → ¬A2)).natural: Either a pet is inside the house, or if furniture is moved in the living room, then the alarm is not triggered by the system.

(A16 → (A15 ∨ (A14 → ¬A2))).natural: Under the condition that it is night time, either a pet is inside the house or furniture being moved in the living room leads to the alarm not being triggered by the system.

(A17 → (A16 → (A15 ∨ (A14 → ¬A2)))).natural: If vacation mode is active, then whenever it is night time, either a pet is inside the house or furniture being moved in the living room results in the alarm not being triggered by the system.

(A17 ∨ A18).natural: Vacation mode is active or test mode is active.

(A18 → (A16 → (A15 ∨ (A14 → ¬A2)))).natural: Provided that test mode is active, if it is night time, then either a pet is inside the house or furniture being moved in the living room causes the alarm not to be triggered by the system.

(A19 → (A17 ∨ A18)).natural: In the event that maintenance is scheduled for the system, either vacation mode is active or test mode is active.

(A3 ∨ ¬A2).natural: Motion is detected by the sensor or the alarm is not triggered by the system.

(A4 → A3).natural: If the entry door is open, then motion is detected by the sensor.

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: The entry door is open or the living room window is open.

(A5 → ¬A2).natural: Whenever the living room window is open, the alarm is not triggered by the system.

(A6 → G).natural: Under the condition that the surveillance camera is active, the system is in an armed status.

(A7 → A6).natural: If the system is powered on, then the surveillance camera is active.

(A9 → ¬A8).natural: In the event that a fire is detected in the kitchen, it is not the case that the admin override is active.

(A9 ∨ A10).natural: Either a fire is detected in the kitchen or a flood is detected in the basement.

(¬(A7 → A6) → A8).natural: If it is not the case that the system being powered on implies the surveillance camera is active, then the admin override is active.

(¬(A9 ∨ A10) → A11).natural: Provided that it is not the case that either a fire is detected in the kitchen or a flood is detected in the basement, the system is manually disabled.

(¬(A9 ∨ A10) → ¬A11).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that either a fire is detected in the kitchen or a flood is detected in the basement, the system is not manually disabled.

(¬(¬(A9 ∨ A10) → ¬A11) → A12).natural: If it is not the case that the absence of either a fire detected in the kitchen or a flood detected in the basement implies the system is not manually disabled, then an emergency call is made.

(¬(¬(A9 ∨ A10) → ¬A11) → ¬A12).natural: In the event that it is not the case that the absence of either a fire detected in the kitchen or a flood detected in the basement implies the system is not manually disabled, it is not the case that an emergency call is made.

(¬(¬G → A1) → A2).natural: Provided that it is not the case that the system not being armed implies the employee is authorized for access, the alarm is triggered by the system.

(¬G → A1).natural: If the system is not armed, then the employee is authorized for access.

A13.natural: A storm is approaching according to the weather report.

A14.natural: Furniture has been moved in the living room.

A19.natural: Maintenance is scheduled for the system.

G.natural: The system is in an armed status.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that the employee is authorized for access.

¬A15.natural: A pet is not inside the house.

¬A2.natural: The alarm is not triggered by the system.

¬A3.natural: Motion is not detected by the sensor.

¬A8.natural: The admin override is not active.
